title: StrifeToons 4 speculation thread
content:
Production is underway, but progressing very slowly as the soundtrack is still being assembled. Details that can be revealed so far:

* Walter has a major speaking role (at last!)!!

* Duke has a new voice actor: TOM HALL!!!!

* Marine gets on the wrong side of the law!

* Mortimer...............? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

----------
www.StrifeStrips.com! Woot! We're back, baby!

title: Re: StrifeToons 4 speculation thread
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] Sounds great!

And TOM HALL?!? Wow, can't wait to see this! (I can't wait otherwise, either, why the garg it takes so long? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] Don't try any excuses about other commissions that pays bills or anything!)3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: suspicious
content: How will we be sure it's Tom Hall? Does anyone here know what his voice sounds like? (Sorry about the cynical post, but that's the way it is sometimes.)

title: Re: suspicious
content:
I bet TMST phoned a 'Tom Hall' of LL's list.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Re: suspicious
content:
Speculation? I speculate that um... TMST will be done at the end of october.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] -----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: suspicious
content:
Tom Hall? T3H TOM HALL??? Yay.

Although the only voice reference of his acting is the fourth boss in Rise of the Triad.------------------------------

content:

title: Re: suspicious
content:
I expect Tom Hall's voice will be too godly to be Duke Nukem.

But I must say, I'm very excited about the next episode. The series has been t3h pwnz0r so far, and I expect it shall continue.[img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]

title: Re: suspicious
content:
How the hell did you manage to get Tom Hall do the voice acting for Duke? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img] Cool!

The best choice would of course have been Jon St John, but I don't think that'd ever happen. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] ____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

content:
